maintainer.name: Gentoo network monitoring and analysis project

pkgmetadata.longdescription: UNINETTs delay statistics for IPv6 is now up and running as a test project. The main goal with this test project,is to test how well Mping 2.0 works against the IPv6 network, and how well it handles IPv4 and IPv6 adresses simultaniously. For now we have to resort to "IPv6 over IPv4 tunneling", but this is not a permanent solution.
